title: How to prove that an argument is invalid - Quora

response.answer_text: By making the nature of the argument clear and the reason behind the invalidity. As almost 50% of arguments are useless, we cannot just declare any argument invalid because arguments happen when opinion differs between more than one parties presence so to prove its invalidity just use the facts as facts are reality and no one can run away from it.
List out all the negative aspects of the argument, and then explain each aspect with cogent points like practicality, ineffectiveness, wastage of resources including precious time element.
